servers.description: An MCP server for conversational FHIR testing that integrates with the Touchstone platform. It enables users to launch test executions, monitor status, and retrieve detailed results through natural language commands.
servers.name: TS-MCP

servers.description: A knowledge graph MCP server that integrates Graphiti and the ACE framework for conversational management of Neo4j-based entities and relationships. It enables AI agents to perform semantic searches, manage data isolation, and utilize automatic learning strategies.
servers.name: GrACE-MCP

servers.description: A Model Context Protocol server that enables users to manage employee leave through natural language. It provides tools to check leave balances, apply for leave, and view leave history via Claude integration.
servers.name: LeaveManager

servers.description:
Banana Boat
English | 日本語
A single-binary MCP server for Gemini image generation
Features • Installation • Quick Start • Configuration • Architecture • Contributing
What is Banana Boat?
Banana Boat is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants like Claude to generate images usi
servers.name: banana-boat

servers.description: Markdown vector search MCP server for Claude Code. Natural language search for markdown files using multilingual-e5-small embeddings.
servers.name: DevRag

servers.description: Enables control of the iOS Simulator using the xcrun simctl command-line utility. It allows users to manage devices, install and launch apps, send push notifications, and simulate device features like GPS location.
servers.name: xcode-mcp

servers.description: Execute, debug, and visualize RxJS streams directly from AI assistants like Claude.
servers.name: rxjs-mcp-server

servers.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for structured understanding of RFC documents.
servers.name: rfcxml-mcp

servers.description: Connects Claude Code to the Perplexity Comet browser to enable autonomous web browsing and agentic research. It features multi-tab management, smart completion detection, and a specialized tool set for organized information retrieval.
servers.name: Perplexity-Comet-MCP

servers.description: An MCP server for headless Qt/PySide6 GUI testing that enables AI assistants to launch desktop applications via Xvfb and perform visual verification. It supports widget discovery, screenshot capture, and simulated user interactions like clicks, typing, and keyboard shortcuts.
servers.name: Qt Pilot
